about_the_game:
Into Death and Beyond is a gripping first-person survival horror set on the mysterious and hostile planet XB32-ENT, where you play as Mark Helkins, a bounty hunter on a mission to capture a rogue alien mutation created by the dark experiments of the GenHaptics Corporation. Following a crash landing, you’re left stranded with only limited resources, facing dangerous creatures and the haunting remnants of a disastrous genetic experiment.

Dive into the haunting depths of a real survival horror experience that will test your courage, resourcefulness, and resolve. Set against the eerie backdrop of a desolate alien world, uncover the mysteries of GenHaptics Inc.’s dark experiments and confront a threat that defies comprehension.

Survival Horror at Its Core

Scavenge for limited resources like plasma ammunition and health kits as you fight for survival. Your weapon can only kill enemies with precise headshots, adding a layer of strategy and tension to every encounter.

Exploration and Puzzle-Solving

Investigate eerie, claustrophobic labs filled with environmental puzzles and hidden logs that reveal the dark history of the experiments. Discover and combine the critical components to build a powerful weapon capable of taking down your ultimate prey.

Dynamic and Non-Linear Gameplay

Explore three distinct laboratories at your own pace in a semi-open world. The planet’s dense atmosphere shrouds everything in mist, hiding dangers and creating constant tension.

Cinematic Storytelling

Experience a dark narrative filled with mystery, corporate corruption, and a chilling final twist. Your mission: capture the alien entity and escape—before it hunts you down.

Terrifying Atmosphere

A combination of post-apocalyptic environments, oppressive fog, and eerie sound design inspired by survival horror classics immerse you in a world where survival is not guaranteed.

Key Features

  • Immersive Survival Horror Gameplay: Face relentless challenges with limited resources, including scarce ammunition and health packs, forcing strategic planning and exploration. Experience the tension of a survival horror classic, blending first-person action with moments of intense vulnerability.

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Navigate a sprawling alien landscape shrouded in dense fog, filled with hidden dangers and the constant presence of a massive, unrelenting predator. Delve into the claustrophobic interiors of three research labs, each packed with secrets, environmental hazards, and gruesome enemies.

  • Engaging Combat and Strategy: Defend yourself against mutated horrors with a low-power plasma weapon, where precision is key—target enemy weak points to survive. Prepare for the ultimate showdown by assembling the final weapon from scattered components, leading to a thrilling battle against a seemingly invincible foe.

  • Deep and Intriguing Narrative: Uncover the sinister history of GenHaptics Inc.’s alien-human genetic experiments and the secrets hidden within logs and environmental storytelling. Encounter themes of corporate greed, political intrigue, and cosmic horror that linger long after the final credits.

  • Non-Linear Progression: Explore the world at your own pace, choosing the order in which you investigate the research labs and collect the necessary tools for your mission.

  • Cinematic Presentation: Experience visually stunning and immersive environments enhanced by high-resolution graphics. Enjoy chilling cinematic sequences that build the narrative and lead to a dramatic, unforgettable finale.

  • Haunting Audio and Music: Feel the dread with an atmospheric soundtrack inspired by horror classics like Alien and Dead Space. Encounter unsettling soundscapes designed to keep you on edge.

  • A True Test of Survival: With limited resources, deadly enemies, and a race against time, every decision matters. Will you survive long enough to uncover the truth—and escape with it?

Can You Survive and Complete Your Mission?

Fight your way through deadly mutants, uncover the truth behind the experiments, and escape with the alien specimen. But remember—some horrors are best left undiscovered.

Are you ready to enter the unknown and face what lies beyond death?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
